# MKSelectionAccessory

**Class**

The type of accessory to display for a selected annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
class MKSelectionAccessory
```

## Overview

Implement [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapViewDelegate/mapView(_:selectionAccessoryFor:)] in your map view delegate to specify a selection accessory for annotation content.

## Creating a selection accessory

- **mapItemDetail(_:)**: Detailed information about a place

## Place information

- **MKMapItemDetailViewControllerDelegate**: The methods that you use to receive events from an associated map view controller.
- **MKMapItemDetailViewController**: An object that displays detailed information about a map item.
- **MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle**: The type of map item detail accessory presentation to use.
- **MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle.CalloutStyle**: The style to use for a map item detail callout presentation.

## Inherits From

- NSObject
